title: Tinkering with MCP
excerpt: Exploring the Model Context Protocol and building custom tools to extend AI capabilities.
content:
I've been diving into the Model Context Protocol (MCP) lately and it's been a fascinating journey!

MCP allows AI assistants to interact with external tools and data sources in a standardized way. I've been experimenting with creating custom MCP servers that can:
- Access local files and repositories
- Integrate with web APIs
- Provide specialized functionality for specific tasks

The protocol is surprisingly flexible and well-designed. You can build servers in any language that supports JSON-RPC, and the client-server architecture makes it easy to add new capabilities.

I'm working on a few custom tools right now and learning a lot about how AI assistants can be extended beyond their base capabilities. More updates coming soon as I continue tinkering!

title: Building This Website
excerpt: A look at how I built this website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with a cyberpunk theme.
content:
Creating this website was a fun project. I wanted something that reflected my style - modern, animated, and with a cyberpunk aesthetic.

The key features include:
- Animated particle background using HTML5 Canvas
- Responsive design that works on all devices
- Smooth fade-in animations
- Clean, minimalist layout

I used vanilla JavaScript for the animations to keep things lightweight and fast. The cyan and black color scheme gives it that futuristic feel I was going for.

title: My Python Learning Journey
excerpt: Sharing my experience learning Python and some cool scripts I've created.
content:
Python has become one of my favorite programming languages. Its simplicity and versatility make it perfect for both beginners and advanced projects.

I've been working on various scripts including:
- Automation tools for daily tasks
- Web scraping projects
- Data analysis experiments

The Python community is amazing, and there are so many resources available for learning. If you're just starting out, I highly recommend diving in and building projects that interest you.
